text: My package came opened, there was hardly any tape holding the box together in the first place and I had expensive shoes I had just ordered. I knew what I was getting myself into when buying pre-owned shoes, however, their photos and description of the shoes were not accurate. They did not show or list discoloration on the sides of the shoes that I purchased.

author: Millie Brinkley
text: I ordered a lovely pair of Versace sandals.  The write up stated that they were a US size 10.5.  Upon receiving them, they were MUCH smaller - more like an 8.  I will be penalized for shipping to send back a pair of shoes that I cannot wear when the description was inaccurate.  When RealReal authenticates an item with a size, is the description not also validated?
title: Penalized on the shipping cost to return Versace sandals that were not accurately described in the writeup.

author: ROBERT
text: First time customer. Ordered a size Large shirt. Shirt arrived and had obviously shrunk in the W\D to an Extra Small. YMMV.
title: First time customer

author: customer
text: I purchased a green Valentino purse that was listed as very good condition. Upon receiving the purse it had tears in the leather and should never have been listed as very good condition. I don’t believe I received the article that was advertised as it was apparent upon receiving the purse it should have had a lower condition rating.

author: Customer
text: I wanted to love TRR but at every turn they have disappointed me. I sent them a bag for consignment in December 2021. It’s now April 2022 and the bag is still marked Pending Review and not available for sale. I’ve contacted customer service 6 times in the last 2 months and still haven’t received any actual help. I’m so frustrated by it all, I would never consign with them again.
title: I wanted to love TRR but at every turn…

author: Angela Simmons
text: This is my first time using TRR. I love the app but I had a hard time obtaining my order. They fell short on sending a confirmation. But I received the order it was nicely packaged. Please pay close attention to the product description before ordering but I will use them again.
title: This is my first time using TRR

author: disappointed
text: This is my second time ordering with the real real and feel like it will be my last. I ordered a purse and what arrived was not accurate to how the purse was displayed - the straps were actually safety pinned to one side of the bag, and when unpinned (as it should be) it's a completely different bag (that you're supposed to wear as a lanyard vs. under the arm?). Knowing that I cannot return, it's a huge bummer and I won't be ordering again.
title: Beware of product display & description!
